name: 亚历山大·冯·洪堡
bio_short: 普鲁士博学家、地理学家、博物学家和探险家。他被认为是“现代地理学之父”，其“美洲探险” (`humboldt_americas_1799`) 和“等温线” (`humboldt_isotherms_1817`) 的发明，开创了生物地理学和比较气候学。
bio_short_en: A Prussian polymath, geographer, naturalist, and explorer. Considered the 'father of modern geography', his scientific expedition to the Americas (`humboldt_americas_1799`) and his invention of 'isotherms' (`humboldt_isotherms_1817`) founded biogeography and comparative climatology.
